snippet.title: Modern Fairway 4: Spec-Ops in the Rough
snippet.description:
LD41's Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres. So... FPS + Golf? 
 We made an FPS golf game- shoot the ball by... shooting it.  Its your duty!

Gear up for Modern Fairway 4: Spec-Ops in the Rough!

Play the game at https://lostdutchman.itch.io/modern-fairway-4-spec-ops-in-the-rough
Vote for the game at  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$77281
